Articles.Content:
Industrial Datasheet: Vessel Monitor for KSP v1.0.2+

by udk\_lethal\_d0se

![Uz9oLgf.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/Uz9oLgf.jpg)

Hey all, just a simple plugin here today. I had a few vessels on the go and thought it would be nice to have some information on which performs certain tasks without actually having to have the vessel loaded and active; so decided to write this little plugin. The window is currently only available in the Space Centre scene, though I'm trying to figure out how to have it run in the Flight scene too. I've found it useful, I hope you will too.

***Features:***

- See a list of vessels containing harvesting and/or conversion equipment, with handy info on active modules, etc.

- Click the ship name to instantly switch to it.

- Runs in the Space Centre scene (for now).

***Changes & Updates:***

- [08/05/2015] Initial release.

***Downloads:***

- Download from [Dropbox](http://bit.ly/1Quc5H3).

***Source:***

- Download from [Dropbox](http://bit.ly/1ALBra5).

Let me know if you have any suggestions, they are always welcome.
